alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ashtabula and southwestern Crawford Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Andover, or 14 miles southeast of Ashtabula, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Andover, Linesville, Harmonsburg, Pymatuning North, Pymatuning Central, Atlantic, Adamsville, Austinburg, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Cherry Valley, Conneautville, Conneaut Lake, Rock Creek, Conneaut Lakeshore and Hartstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
